description: Must be used as the last child of ListItem to function properly.
propChildren: The content of the component, normally an `IconButton` or selection control.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesDisableGutters: Styles applied to the root element when the parent `ListItem` has `disableGutters={true}`.
